label: Hip Abduction
short_description: Pushing the legs laterally away from the midline of the body.

label: Hip Adduction
short_description: Squeezing the legs inward toward the midline of the body.

label: Dorsiflexion
short_description: Pulling the top of the foot upward toward the shin.

label: Wrist Flexion
short_description: Curling the knuckles inward toward the inner forearm.

label: Wrist Extension
short_description: Extending the knuckles backward toward the outer forearm.

label: External Rotation
short_description: Rotating the upper arm outward away from the torso.

label: Internal Rotation
short_description: Rotating the upper arm inward across the torso.

label: Vacuum
short_description: Isometric pulling of the abdominal wall inward.

label: Dip
short_description: Pushing the body or weight downward and away from the torso.

label: Chest Dip
short_description: Pushing down with a forward torso lean.

label: Tricep Dip
short_description: Pushing down with a strictly upright torso.

label: Curl
short_description: Bending the arm at the elbow against resistance.

label: Arm Extension
short_description: Straightening the arm at the elbow against resistance.

label: Overhead Ext
short_description: Straightening the arm from an overhead position.

label: Pushdown
short_description: Straightening the arm downward with neutral shoulders.

label: Pullover
short_description: Moving arms in a long sagittal arc from overhead toward the hips.

label: Lat Pullover
short_description: Pulling arc focusing on lat stretch.

label: Chest Pullover
short_description: Pulling arc focusing on chest squeeze.

label: Shrug
short_description: Vertical elevation of the shoulder girdle.

label: Vertical Pull
short_description: Pulling resistance from overhead down toward the body.

label: Behind Neck
short_description: Vertical pulling motion behind the head.

label: Front Pulldown
short_description: Standard vertical pulling motion.

label: Horizontal Row
short_description: Pulling resistance from in front of the body toward the torso.

label: High Row
short_description: Pulling toward the upper chest.

label: Mid Row
short_description: Pulling toward the stomach.

label: Low Row
short_description: Pulling toward the hips/navel.

label: Crush
short_description: Creating inward tension by pressing hands or weights together.

label: Press
short_description: Moving resistance horizontally away from the torso in a straight line.

label: Flat Press
short_description: Horizontal pressing movement on flat surface

label: Incline Press
short_description: Incline pressing movement targeting upper chest

label: Decline Press
short_description: Pushing at a downward angle (-15°).

label: Vertical Press
short_description: Moving resistance vertically away from the shoulders.

label: High Incline Press
short_description: 60-75° incline – heavy upper chest + front delt emphasis

label: Overhead Press
short_description: Vertical press overhead – pure shoulder + tricep drive

label: Fly
short_description: Moving the arms in a wide hugging arc toward the midline.

label: Flat Fly
short_description: Hugging arc on a horizontal plane.

label: Incline Fly
short_description: Hugging arc at an upward angle.

label: Decline Fly
short_description: Hugging arc at a downward angle.

label: Scoop
short_description: Upward underhand arcing path.

label: Neck Flexion
short_description: Tilting the head forward under load.

label: Neck Extension
short_description: Tilting the head backward under load.

label: Raise
short_description: Raising the arms in an arc without bending the elbows.

label: Front Raise
short_description: Arcing arms out to the front.

label: Lateral Raise
short_description: Arcing arms out to the sides.

label: V-Raise
short_description: Arcing arms at a 45-degree angle.

label: Reverse Fly
short_description: Arcing the arms backward away from the midline.

label: Face Pull
short_description: Pulling resistance toward the face to engage the upper back.

label: Back Extension
short_description: Extending the torso backward against gravity.

label: Calf Raise
short_description: Lifting the heels to engage the lower leg.

label: Bent-Knee Calf Raise
short_description: Raising heels with flexed knees targeting Soleus.

label: Straight-Knee Calf Raise
short_description: Raising heels with fully extended knees targeting Gastrocnemius.

label: Leg Curl
short_description: Bending the knee to bring the heel toward the glutes.

label: Leg Extension
short_description: Straightening the knee against resistance.

label: Hinge
short_description: Bending primarily at the hips with minimal knee bend.

label: Deadlift
short_description: Conventional hip hinge with bar on floor

label: Stiff Leg
short_description: Minimal knee bend hip hinge focusing on hamstring stretch.

label: Thrust
short_description: Driving the hips forward in a bridging motion.

label: Squat
short_description: Bending at the hips and knees simultaneously.

label: Back Squat
short_description: Balanced knee/hip flexion.

label: Front Squat
short_description: Upright squat emphasizing knees.

label: Lunge
short_description: Horizontal step with eccentric control – quad/glute/ham focus

label: Lateral Lunge
short_description: Stepping out to the side, stretching the inner thigh.

label: Split Squat
short_description: Stationary single-leg squat.

label: Walking Lunge
short_description: Dynamic single-leg step.

label: Plank
short_description: Static core stability holds bracing the spine.

label: Crunch
short_description: Rolling or flexing the spine forward.

label: Side Bend
short_description: Bending the torso sideways.

label: Rotation
short_description: Twisting the torso horizontally or diagonally.

label: Leg Raise
short_description: Lifting the legs toward the torso.

label: Anti-Extension
short_description: Resisting spinal extension in prone position

label: Anti-Lateral Flexion
short_description: Resisting side bending of the spine

label: Anti-Rotation
short_description: Resisting rotational forces on the torso

label: Reverse Fly Flat
short_description: Rear delt isolation on flat bench or machine

label: Reverse Fly Incline
short_description: Upper rear delt emphasis with incline support

label: Reverse Fly Decline
short_description: Lower rear delt + mid trap emphasis on decline

label: Step Up
short_description: Vertical drive off elevated surface, quad/glute focus

label: Composite
short_description: Movements that cross upper + lower body in one pattern

label: Olympic
short_description: Barbell explosive lifts requiring technique & power

label: Thruster
short_description: Squat into overhead press – legs + shoulders in one rep

label: Kettlebell Swing
short_description: Hip snap power – posterior chain + core explosion

label: Burpee
short_description: Squat → plank → push-up → jump – total body conditioning

label: Ball Slam
short_description: Explosive overhead slam – core + full posterior chain

label: Turkish Get-Up
short_description: Floor to stand with overhead lock – stability monster

label: Muscle Up
short_description: Pull-up to dip transition – upper body + core power

label: Jumping Jack
short_description: Continuous full-body cardio with shoulder + leg drive

label: Clean
short_description: Explosive pull + catch in front rack – full body power

label: Snatch
short_description: Explosive pull + overhead catch – ultimate full body

label: Clean & Jerk
short_description: Clean + jerk combo – total body power & coordination

label: Power Clean
short_description: Explosive clean caught in partial squat

label: Hang Clean
short_description: Clean from hang position – more explosive pull

label: Power Snatch
short_description: Snatch caught in partial squat

label: Hang Snatch
short_description: Snatch from hang – emphasis on speed & power

label: Split Jerk
short_description: Jerk with split stance catch

label: Push Jerk
short_description: Jerk with feet together catch

label: Jump Shrug
short_description: Explosive shrug + jump – trap & calf power

label: Olympic High Pull
short_description: Explosive pull to chest height – trap & posterior power

label: Snatch Pull
short_description: Explosive pull for snatch patterning
